newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Banco de Colombia Q3 profit rises.
newsitem.headline: Banco de Colombia Q3 profit rises.

text.p: Banco de Colombia SA, the country's second-largest bank in terms of assets, on Thursday posted the following results:
Net profits for the third quarter: 17.77 billion pesos vs 11.54 billion pesos.
Net profits accumulated nine-months: 52.3 billion pesos vs 32.52 billion pesos.
Operating income for accumulated nine-months 28.88 billion pesos. No figure available for corresponding period of 1995.
NOTE: No figures available for net income. Figures are unconsolidated and subject to approval by Colombia's Securities Superintendency.
